senses.sense_definition: A decorative technique of wood inlaying used to create mosaic-like pictures.

examples.text: The antique cabinet features intricate wood <w>intarsia</w> depicting a hunting scene.
He spent years mastering the art of <w>intarsia</w> to restore Italian furniture.

senses.sense_definition: A knitting technique used to create multi-colored patterns resembling a mosaic.

examples.text: This sweater pattern uses <w>intarsia</w> to create the large geometric shapes on the front.
Unlike other colorwork methods, <w>intarsia</w> knitting does not carry yarn across the back.
